landing.message: Register in the app using one of the following ways

create_account.heading: Account data
create_account.paragraph: Fill in the fields below to register

phone.label: Phone
phone.pattern: The telephone number must contain only numbers

password.label: Password
password.pattern: The password must contain a minimum of 8 characters, uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and special characters, without spaces

terms.required: You must accept the Terms, Conditions and Privacy Policy in order to proceed.

validate_account.heading: Check code received by email
validate_account.paragraph: Fill in the fields below to register.

code.label: Enter the code received by email
code.placeholder: Enter the code received by email
code.length: The code must be 6 characters long
code.pattern: The code must contain only digits

create_user.heading: User data
create_user.paragraph: Fill in the fields below to complete the registration.

first_name.label: First name
first_name.min: The first name can be a minimum of {{value}} characters
first_name.max: The first name can have a maximum of {{value}} characters

last_name.label: Name
last_name.min: The name can have a minimum of {{value}} characters
last_name.max: The name can have a maximum of {{value}} characters

errors.username_exists: There is already a user with this email address
errors.signup: Registration error. Check your registration details and try again.
errors.invalid_password: Password is not compliant with security policy

login.title: Login
login.paragraph: Enter your email and password to log in.

forgot_password.paragraph: Please enter your account email or phone number to reset your password.

code.label: Enter the code received by email
code.placeholder: Enter the code received by email
code.length: The code must be 6 characters long
code.pattern: The code must contain only digits

password.label: Password
password.pattern: The password must contain a minimum of 8 characters, uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers and special characters, without spaces

identity_data.title: Identity data
identity_data.description: Enter your ID card details. These will be used to generate the volunteer contract.

series.label: Identity document (ID) series
series.matches: The series must contain only letters

number.label: Identity document number (CI)
number.matches: The number must contain only digits

address.label: Domiciled in
address.helper: Enter the full address from your ID.
address.min: The address can have a minimum of {{value}} characters
address.max: The address can have a maximum of {{value}} characters

organization_profile.title: Organization profile
organization_profile.code: Do you have an access code?

disclaimer.access_request_pending: Your registration awaits approval from the organization
disclaimer.volunteer_archived: Your volunteer profile has been deactivated!
disclaimer.volunteer_blocked: Your access to the organization has been restricted

identity_data_missing.heading: Oops!
identity_data_missing.paragraph: You didn't fill in the identity data in my Account. Fill it in to join an organization.

confirm_cancel_request.heading: Are you cancelling your application?
confirm_cancel_request.paragraph: The application has been sent to the organization's coordinators. Are you sure you want to withdraw your application?

join_ngo.complete: Fill in the details below to join the organization.

referral.label: How did you hear about us?

motivation.label: What motivates you to volunteer?
motivation.min: The motivation can be a minimum of {{value}} characters
motivation.max: The motivation can be up to {{value}} characters long
motivation.helper: Fill in the field to register.

errors.ACCESS_REQUEST_001: There is already an access request for this organization
errors.ORG_001: The organization has not been found
errors.VOLUNTEER_002: The user is already part of the organization
errors.USER_005: The user does not have the identification data filled in

success.heading: Congratulations!
success.paragraph: The application has been sent to the organization's coordinators. You will be notified as soon as they have responded.

access_request.title: Application for access refused
access_request.paragraph: Your access request dated {{date}} has been rejected.

leave_ngo.paragraph: If you leave the organization, it will delete your data.

confirm_leave_organization.heading: Are you sure you want to leave the organization?
confirm_leave_organization.paragraph: If you leave the organization, it will delete your data, including your registered hours and volunteer documents. For more details, you can contact the organization.

volunteer.title: Volunteer profile
volunteer.no_org_added: You have not added any organizations yet

errors.VOLUNTEER_PROFILE_003: The volunteer has no profile created. Create one first!
errors.VOLUNTEER_003: Only active volunteers can be archived
errors.VOLUNTEER_004: Only archived volunteers can be activated
errors.VOLUNTEER_005: The user has no organization profile for this NGO

missing_profile.heading: You have not yet created a user profile

create_volunteer.heading: Complete volunteer profile
create_volunteer.paragraph: Fill in your volunteer profile to be contacted and start reporting your volunteer hours!

errors.VOLUNTEER_001: The volunteer has not been found!
errors.VOLUNTEER_PROFILE_001: The volunteer already has a profile!

mention.label: Mention
mention.min: The mention can be a minimum of {{value}} characters
mention.max: The mention can have a maximum of {{value}} characters
mention.helper: Fill in the field to register.

errors.EVENT_RSVP_006: The event is not yet published
errors.EVENT_RSVP_005: Please fill in your volunteer profile before joining the event
errors.EVENT_RSVP_002: You must be a volunteer in the organization to participate in this event
errors.EVENT_RSVP_004: For this event it is mandatory to mention

error_modal.title: Ups!
error_modal.description: You did not fill in the data for your volunteer profile. Fill it out in order to be able to attend the event.

error_modal.title: Ups!
error_modal.description: You did not fill in the data for your volunteer profile. Fill it out in order to be able to log volunteering hours.

hours.label: Number of hours
hours.number: The number must contain only digits
hours.required: The number of hours is compulsory
hours.min: The number of hours must be greater than {{value}}
hours.max: The number of hours must be less than {{value}}
hours.integer: The number of hours must be whole

mentions.label: Mentions
mentions.min: The mention can be a minimum of {{value}} characters
mentions.max: The mention can have a maximum of {{value}} characters

errors.ACTIVITY_LOG_002: The volunteer does not have a completed profile
errors.ACTIVITY_LOG_004: Cannot cancel approved or rejected requests
errors.ACTIVITY_TYPE_001: Type of activity does not exist

confirmation_modal.paragraph: Are you sure you want to delete this log?

home.paragraph: Welcome to your VIC account, the place that connects NGOs and those who want to contribute to creating a better world.
home.no_ngo_title: You didn't add any organizations yet
home.no_ngo_paragraph: Discover the organizations registered in VIC and the events you want to dedicate your time to.

access_code.title: Access code
access_code.description: If you have an access code from your organization, enter it below to join automatically.

code.min: The code can be a minimum of {{value}} characters
code.max: The code can have a maximum of {{value}} characters

success.heading: Congratulations!
success.paragraph: The code entered is correct, and you have successfully joined the organization. To continue, you need to complete your volunteer profile.

documents.description: Manage your contracts in the sections below. Download old contracts or sign contracts sent by your organization.

paragraph.PENDING_VOLUNTEER: The contract has been generated and requires your approval. Download the template below and read the document carefully. Please print out a copy of it, which you can sign, scan and upload here.
paragraph.PENDING_ADMIN: You sent a document for signature. The contract has been generated and requires approval from the organization.

disclaimer.PENDING_ADMIN: The contract requires the signature of the organization

cancel.success: The contract has been returned to its original state!

errors.CONTRACT_007: Cannot cancel a contract approved by the admin

confirmation_modal.paragraph: Are you sure you wish to cancel and upload a different contract?

warning_modal.description: Notifications are currently disabled for this app. To receive important updates and alerts, please enable notifications in your phone's settings.

errors.USER_003: Email or phone are already used
errors.USER_008: Error while updating user phone number!

documents.new: generated your volunteer contract. Download and sign.

delete_account.title: Confirm account deletion
delete_account.header: Are you sure you wish to permanently delete your account?
delete_account.paragraph: To delete your account on the VIC application, please confirm your decision below. Deleting your account will result in the permanent loss of your data and access to the application. If you are certain about this action, click the 'Confirm Deletion' button. Keep in mind that this process is irreversible, and you will need to create a new account if you wish to use VIC in the future.
delete_account.error: There was an error trying to delete your account. Please contact us at {{value}} to finalize the process.
